Apos.​Input.​ConditionKeyboard
Apos.​Input.​Condition
public
Apos.​Input.​ConditionKeyboard

Checks various conditions on a specific keyboard key.  Non static methods implicitly make sure that the game is active. Otherwise returns false.

Constructors
ConditionKeyboard
public ConditionKeyboard(
Keys needKey
)
Parameter
needKey
Keys

The key to operate on.

Public Functions
Pressed
public bool Pressed()
Returns

Returns true when a key was not pressed and is now pressed.

Held
public bool Held()
Returns

Returns true when a key is now pressed.

HeldOnly
public bool HeldOnly()
Returns

Returns true when a key was pressed and is now pressed.

Released
public bool Released()
Returns

Returns true when a key was pressed and is now not pressed.

Keys key
)
Returns

Returns true when a key was released and is now pressed.
